card_text: Once per turn: You can banish 2 cards from your Graveyard (any combination of Rock-Type monsters or Field Spell Cards), then activate 1 of these effects;$N●Target 1 other face-up card on the field; destroy it.$N●Target 1 Rock-Type monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it in Defense Position.$N●Target up to 3 Field Spell Cards in your Graveyard; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card.
